meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: The next ice age is expected to begin within 2,000 years. But scientists say global warming may alter the course of nature. Science Times, page C1.
Military instructors are finding that with East-West tensions easing, war games aimed at the Soviets are growing increasingly irrelevant.
The next ice age is expected to begin within 2,000 years. But scientists say global warming may alter the course of nature. Science Times, page C1.
Military instructors are finding that with East-West tensions easing, war games aimed at the Soviets are growing increasingly irrelevant.
The next ice age is expected to begin within 2,000 years. But scientists say global warming may alter the course of nature. Science Times, page C1.
Military instructors are finding that with East-West tensions easing, war games aimed at the Soviets are growing increasingly irrelevant. Page A20.
An increase in drug cases in New York City is leading to rough and rapid justice in a frayed and overwhelmed institution. Page B1.
A Jersey City luxury residential development born in the optimism of the mid-1980's is floundering in the economic slowdown. Page B1.
Paul Tagliabue, National Football League commissioner, said he was leaning toward allowing college underclassmen to turn pro. Page B7.
